hero_subtitle: FREE Advanced Call & SMS Blocker for Android
hero_description: Tired of relentless spam calls and scam messages? YourCallYourRule gives you the power to block unwanted calls and texts with ease. Enjoy a peaceful, distraction-free phone experience, completely FREE!
features_description: Take control of your calls with these powerful features:
feature_block_desc: Automatically blocks spam, scams, and robocalls using advanced algorithms.
feature_filter_desc: Filters out unwanted text messages, keeping your inbox clean and focused.
feature_list_desc: Create personal blocklists and whitelists for fine-grained control.
feature_rules_desc: Set rules based on numbers, keywords, wildcards, and time schedules.
feature_privacy_desc: Your data stays on your device. We don't collect or share your information.
feature_database_desc: Enhance blocking with an optional subscription to a real-time spam database.
feature_regex_desc: Create powerful and complex blocking rules using regular expressions.
feature_plugin_desc: Expand the app's functionality with custom plugins.
download_description: Download the app and start protecting your peace today!
download_github_desc: For advanced users and SMS filtering (outside Play Store policies).
community_description: Connect, share tips, and get support.
